    CurrentGameInformation.java --- Storage class for all current information of the game.
    Author:
    P H - 22.07.2017

    • Constructor Detail

      • CurrentGameInformation

        public CurrentGameInformation()

      • CurrentGameInformation

        public CurrentGameInformation(int currentUnitCountTotal,
                              int currentWorkerCount,
                              int currentBuildingCount,
                              int currentCombatUnitCount,
                              double currentWorkerPercent,
                              double currentBuildingsPercent,
                              double currentCombatUnitsPercent,
                              java.util.HashMap<bwapi.UnitType,java.util.HashSet<bwapi.Unit>> currentUnits,
                              java.util.HashSet<bwapi.TechType> currentTechs,
                              java.util.HashMap<bwapi.UpgradeType,java.lang.Integer> currentUpgrades)
        Parameters:
        currentUnitCountTotal - the total number of Units the Bot controls.
        currentWorkerCount - the number of worker Units.
        currentBuildingCount - the number of buildings.
        currentCombatUnitCount - the number of combat Units.
        currentWorkerPercent - the actual current percentage of worker Units.
        currentBuildingsPercent - the actual current percentage of buildings.
        currentCombatUnitsPercent - the actual current percentage of combat Units.
        currentUnits - all current Units.
        currentTechs - all currently researched TechTypes of the desired ones.
        currentUpgrades - all currently performed UpgradeTypes of the desired ones.

    • Method Detail

      • generateCurrentUnitCounts

        private java.util.HashMap<bwapi.UnitType,java.lang.Integer> generateCurrentUnitCounts(java.util.HashMap<bwapi.UnitType,java.util.HashSet<bwapi.Unit>> currentUnits)
        Internal function for transforming a HashMap containing references to all current Player Units to a HashMap containing the UnitTypes as keys and the number of Units currently associated with this type as value.
        Parameters:
        currentUnits - the currently active Units of the Player.
        Returns:
        a new HashMap containing UnitTypes as keys and the number of Units of that type that the Player currently controls as values.
